attr.title: Turret vs Turret
attr.desc: 1 or 2 player retro artillery mini game! Press and hold the button to lock barrel angle; release the button to lock force and shoot. First to five wins.
attr.inst: Download the Linux game free from ottoojala.com (https://ottoojala.com), extract, and copy tvst.pck to the port's folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the **Linux** game free from [ottoojala.com](https://ottoojala.com), extract, and copy `tvst.pck` to the port's folder.
